name: Touhou: Scarlet Romance Endeavour
description:
Touhou: Scarlet Romance Endeavour is a game I made in 4 days for the Touhou Game Jam 8 hosted on itch.io. The theme was "Dreams/Dreaming".

The seemingly calm and uninspired Rinnosuke Morichika is actually a highly romantic man in his dreams.

Doremy Sweet, a bored baku who has been looking for a source of excitement in the Dream World, decides to help him by organising a Dream World-brand matchmaking session.

...Although, it seems as if she did not consider whether Rinnosuke himself is compatible with the wonderful lady she selected. Danmaku ensues!
I pretty much rushed the game to meet the 4-day deadline, so there are a lot of imperfections and unfinished stuff everywhere. I may put out a post-jam update, but for now, please enjoy!

CREDITS:

Fonts: Unispace, Connecting Chain Handserif, Cirno, MS Gothic

Code: Kevinmonitor (me)

Art, Sprites, Bullet Graphics and Music: Kevinmonitor (me)

Sound Effects: Kevinmonitor (me), made in bfxr

...Pretty much everything, really (except for fonts lol): Kevinmonitor (me)

Special Thanks: Megapig9001, Nutty, and the Touhou Game Dev Server for helping out with some story elements.

BASIC CONTROLS: (it works like any other Touhou-style shoot-em-up, really...)

Arrow Keys: Movement/Select  

Z: Fire/Confirm (hold Z for rapid-fire)  

X: Use Spell Card (limited use)/Cancel    

Esc (while in-game): Pause

Shift (hold): Enter Focus Mode.

During Focus Mode, your hitbox becomes visible, you move significantly slower, and your shot becomes more concentrated (usually).

It is **incredibly** helpful for dodging large, dense waves of bullets, so please use it whenever things get too tight.
